ygData.subject: RE: Disobedient pets
ygData.msgSnippet: ... John, I m guessing here because I don t use charm yet(4 and a half bubbles til I get it), but I ve noticed some pretty weird things happening if you use
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>
> I haven't been able to reproduce this at will, but I *think*
> this happens when I charm a mob, order it to attack another
> mob, it becomes uncharmed, a party member attacks it, and I
> re-charm it. I know it's not the command failing because the
> charmed mob says the appropriate things but keeps right on
> attacking. Does anyone know what's up with this?

John,

I'm guessing here because I don't use charm yet(4 and a half bubbles til I
get it), but I've noticed some pretty weird things happening if you use the
/assist command to fight something another party member is fighting. Are
you using /assist?

Anthem Dirgemaker
26th level Bard of Qeynos
Solusek Ro
